com.alphatrader.rest

Class Company

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alphatrader.rest.Company

  • public class Company
extends Object
    Represents a company in the game. Contains factory methods for parsing api json answers as well.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Christopher Guckes (christopher.guckes@torq-dev.de)
